Essentially, all of the complaints here are bugs in the program.

There are several times with various characters when I have been able 
to walk right by an opponent and not get attacked.

Yet, there are other times, I've seen my team mates stuck glued to an 
opponent they can't reach (a wall or a forest is the between the two 
characters).  Meanwhile, there are opponents they can reach, but they 
are not going after.  X-ray vision should only apply if you can walk 
through walls or forests.
